name: Rogue Hike
description:
Rogue Hike is a deck-building survival-stealth roguelike about the beauty and terror of nature.

If you have audio or performance issues, try out the Windows build below!
Controls:

LMB - Select cards, Play Cards

RMB - Pan camera

MMB Scroll - Zoom in/out camera

Team

  • @lzklein - Sound Designer, Composer
  • @bordenary - 3D/2D Artist
  • @ZRubyWorks - 3D/2D Artist
  • @JaidenG123 - Engineer, Gameplay Designer
  • @BrandnGarcia - Producer, VFX Artist

Rogue Hike  was made in 7 days for the 7 Day Roguelike Challenge 2023:  https://itch.io/jam/7drl-challenge-2023

Mobile Controls:

- Tap once to hover, tap again to select

- 2 finger tap to cancel selection

- 2 finger drag to pan camera

- Zoom currently not supported
